title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 262.200 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 262.200 - Purpose

State Regulations

The purpose of this Part is to establish programs
designed to help prevent accidents and injuries resulting from the misuse of
alcohol by employees who perform covered functions for operators of certain
pipeline facilities subject to part
192, 193
or
195
of title 49 of the Code of

Federal Regulations (
49 CFR
). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
262.200

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
